Land Adventures

Zip-lining

Soar through the rainforest canopy on our thrilling zip-line adventure.

Learn More

Snorkeling

Explore Taniti's Underwater Paradise

Discover vibrant coral reefs and swim alongside tropical fish in our crystal-clear waters. Our guided snorkeling tours provide equipment and expert instruction for all skill levels.

Duration: 2-3 hours

Price: $45 per person

Includes: Equipment rental, guide, and refreshments

Departure: Daily at 9:00 AM and 1:00 PM from Yellow Leaf Bay

Book This Tour

Fishing

This is placeholder content for the Fishing section of the Activities page.

In a real website, this would contain detailed information about fishing tours.

Zip-lining

Soar Through the Rainforest Canopy

Experience the thrill of flying through Taniti's lush rainforest on our zip-line adventure. Our professional guides ensure a safe and exhilarating experience as you take in breathtaking views from above.

Duration: 3-4 hours

Price: $75 per person

Includes: Equipment, safety briefing, guided tour, and transportation from major hotels

Departure: Daily at 8:00 AM and 1:00 PM from the Rainforest Adventure Center

Book This Tour
